About This Page

The "Edit Folders" page displays a list of all existing message folders and gives the user the option of creating, renaming, or deleting folders. To create a new folder, just type one into the empty field. To rename an existing folder, just type over its name. And to delete a folder, just clear the text field the name is in.

It makes use of the following functions:

  • Friends:Message_Folder_Form to output edit form as well as handle success/error messages upon submit.
